title.rendered: Skall Studio SS24 at Copenhagen Fashion Week

content.rendered:
Skall Studio SS24 Spring/Summer 2024 Collection at Copenhagen Fashion Week

The Blue Window

For endless days spent in peacefulness. Leaving room for reflection. Shades of blue and dusty green, the colours of the ocean. Casual styles embracing the body and soft tailoring for an effortless look. Long crochet dresses made in Italy - and crochet bags made by hand in India.

For the beauty of simplicity and craftsmanship.

GOTS certified Skall Denim in new colours and belted denim dresses, skirts, and shorts for casual summer living. Small flower print, a new version of the first Skall SS19 flower print, and a pale rose short skirt as seen on the first Skall Studio collection, celebrating 10 years with Skall Studio in 2024. Outer- wear in terms of long classic coats with buttons made of nuts.

As classic will last forever.

Danish knitwear this season with delicate hole pattern and different knitting techniques. The knitwear is made in Denmark in one of the last remaining spinning mills and knitting factories.

To support craftsmanship and local production.

Skall Studio is GOTS certified, and the collection is made in 100 % natural fibers and 95 % mono fibers.

Runway looks

Photo: Press Skall Studio

More on: @skallstudio


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
